It’s snug at the top and loose at the waist.

评论概述: Fraudulent product, beware of you try and return
评论详情: I bought this dress, it was not fitting properly, looked too big. Sent the item back in 2 weeks and they notified they received it and would not give me my money back. I am a prime member. I called again multiple times. I had to upload my id, did that, still had to call Amazon because they would not refund my money. Asked for supervisor, they said we will refund you. Same day they refunded part of refund. Waited 4 days, called Amazon and still having issues. I would not trust this product. I still have not received my money

I bought 2 dresses in this style (baby blue & a teal color). In the pageant system I participated in, the fashion sense is “sexy conservative” & a gathered fabric waistline is perfect to achieve that look. The material is soft & flexible. The zipper is easy to pull on by yourself compared to other dresses. I’m about 5’1, 5’2” on a good day & it reaches perfectly at my knees. If you’re a bottom heavy lady, it will hitch up a bit. The slit in the back is extremely sexy! If you gain weight & maybe increase in 2-5 sizes, there’s a slight chance you can still wear it. I know I can :) Great buy!
I’m ordering more in different colors

评论概述: Cute dress, and works in a pinch
评论详情: It's a cute and flattering dress. Especially for the price. But the fabric is definitely thin, and it's cheap, so it's rough. If you have sensitive skin, this will bother you. If you wear something under it, it could make it easier to wear. I got a large, and my measurements are bust: 39, waist: 30.5 and hips 41.5. it was fitted, but not too tight. I knocked off two stars because the material is thin, and kind of itchy. But it was worth it for what I needed it for. next time I will wear a slip under it.

The dress/material is well made and true to size. I got a medium and needed no alterations. I’m 5’0 and the dress hit below my knees so it might be higher for a taller person. I would buy this dress again. Good value for your money.
This dress fits me so well and is super comfortable! You definitely get the quality that you pay for, but I still think this dress will last a long time. Highly recommend!
This dress felt cheap, fit cute but wasn’t happy with this material

I took a chance and ordered a medium. I usually order a large but the other reviews said the dress has stretch and it sure does!!  The medium is a perfect fit and the stretch allowed me to zip the dress and still be able to breath. The fit is very flattering and the color is a gorgeous deep purple.  I'm 5'3 155lbs for reference. Buy it! I've already ordered another one in a different color! 🙂 You can't beat this price!! Other dresses in stores similar to this style start at $70 and higher.
Material was a bit stretchy so theye was a small amount of give.  Great dress.

I like this dress more than expected. It’s flattering! I’m debating buying a second color.

Once I get the right size, this dress will be a great addition to my closet!

It was gorgeous. SUPER form fitting and SO not appropriate for a funeral. Wedding? Yes. Cocktail party- yes. Maybe it would have worked with a blazer over top. I am sending it back but if you have an event coming up, this was a great dress. Funeral? Maybe size up for a more demure/business-like fit.
